Package de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.fsm

Class FiniteStateMachine<T>

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.ai.AIAlgorithm<Npc>
de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.fsm.FiniteStateMachine<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
NpcStateObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimalFSM, HumanFSM, MonsterFSM
public abstract class FiniteStateMachine<T>
extends AIAlgorithm<Npc>
implements NpcStateObserver
Manage the FSMs for the NPC
Author:
init version Florian Amthor, edit Tobias Mueller, new version Christoph Weidner, new version Achim Bunke

  • Method Details

    • addAllAvailableStates

      public abstract void addAllAvailableStates()
      Add all the available States for the NPC in this method. Example: addState(new DeadState()) if the NPC should drop all Items before he die

    • addState
